import React, { useState } from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import Button from "./buttons"; import TextBox from "./textbox"; import Result from "./result"; function App() { const [query, setQuery] = useState(0); const [result, setResult] = useState(); const [intermediate_result, setIntermediateResult] = useState(); const props = { query: query, setQuery: setQuery, intermediate_result: intermediate_result, setIntermediateResult: setIntermediateResult, result: result, setResult: setResult, }; return ( <>
); } ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById("root"));
